name: Maintenance
short_desc: Maintenance includes: landscaping, signs and pavement marking, street sweeping; tree, traffic signals and street lighting
description: Maintenance includes: landscaping; signs and pavement markings; street sweeping; storm drainage; trees; traffic signals and street lighting.Sandbags can be picked up for Dublin residents at the City's Corporation Yard 5777 Scarlett Court, in Dublin. For more information, please contact Public Works at 925-833-6630.
